ComicInfo.Summary:
When the Blue Dragon dies, six stars fall out of the night sky! Ailing Master Long, leader of the Mighty Zodiac, orders his warriors to gather the stars, lest they fall into the hands of the malevolent Moon Rabbit Army. With the stars, the Mighty Zodiac may yet revive their master, rescue their world, and restore the light. Without the stars, the darkness threatens to divide the tribes and destroy Gaya...
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Corin Howell & Maarta Laiho | 1 | Var | Variant Cover | Gurihiru | 2 | RE | Fried Pie Exclusive Connecting Variant Cover | Leila del Duca | 3 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-12-13 01:20:19. [CVDB523321]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Corin Howell, Gurihiru, Leila del Duca, Maarta Laiho
